product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: E | ADMIN BUILDING > E2 | AUTOMATIC SPRINKLER SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint. Pipe joints shall be of grooved with groove couplings. All related civil work viz as wall cutting, structural supports etc for laying of sprinkler piping shall be vendor's scope. e 40 mm NB
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: grade: heavy, thickness: 5.4mm, standard: indian standard 1239 part -1, fittings: elbows, tees, flanges, reduces clamps, ms support dash fasteners, painting: two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint, joint type: grooved with groove couplings, feature: all related civil work for laying of sprinkler piping vendor's scope
